item.title: Gaza hospital hit by Israeli strike, Hamas says
item.description: The group said the attack on Al-Ahli Baptist Hospital was a "horrific crime" committed by Israel, which said it was looking into the reports.

item.title: Trump exempts smartphones and computers from new tariffs
item.description: It follows concerns that tech prices could skyrocket, as many gadgets are made in China, with the US president saying he will give more detail on Mond...

item.title: Thousands attend pro-Serbia government rally after months of unrest
item.description: An estimated 50,000 people were there - significantly less than the 325,000 at last month's anti-government protest.

item.title: Indian pot belly: From status symbol to silent killer
item.description: Indiaâ€™s obesity crisis is surging - and the humble pot belly may be a bigger villain than it seems.

item.title: Man mistakenly deported to El Salvador 'alive and secure', US says
item.description: A judge has called for the Trump administration to facilitate the return of Kilmar Abrego Garcia to the US.
